message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you do that?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $95.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $92.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $87.50. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $90.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $87, but that's as low as I can go. Can you accept that?
